alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 2:18PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Otero and west central Bent Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 218 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near North La Junta, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... La Junta and North La Junta around 230 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County
